Package com.CSCE331.boba_pos

Class Drink

java.lang.Object
com.CSCE331.boba_pos.Drink
public class Drink extends Object
The Drink class represents a drink ordered by the customer. It has options for price, flavor, base, ice, sugar, quantity, and toppings. Each drink object is added to the Order class that it belongs to, and is then displayed in the cashier_view_right panel order details.
Since:
1.0
